Reviews.Title: perfect 1st camera
Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 7th grader to tote around and she loves it.  Her pictures suit her needs-cute snapshots of her friends. If she loses it, I'm not out a fortune.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera, at a good price.
Reviews.Author: Kevin W. Miller
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my girl friend for Christmas. I am impressed by it and this it's very good for the price I payed for it. I also look that you have a choice it colors such as pink, blue, green and others. My only gripe is that the buttons on the camera are a little confusing and it took a while for us to figure out how to work it properly but everything is made up for by the wonderful 8MP pictures it takes. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Gift for daughter
Reviews.Author: R. Hasty
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old daughter. Basic picture taking/viewing is easy enough for her to catch on to very easily. Picture quality is good, although indoor images appear darker when compared to other cameras. Overall, my daughter loves being able to take and delete her own pictures and uploading them to my computer or website is very easy to do.

Reviews.Title: ok camera
Reviews.Author: S. Green
Reviews.Content: We've never been able to get volume working on this camera. Other than that my daughter likes this camera

ProductInfo.Features:
0.7" Super-Slim, All-Metal Body
Face Detection

ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE360 8MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Dual Zoom (Pink)
